domain

Class StatVar

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.StatVar

  • public class StatVar
extends java.lang.Object
    For the sequentially given observations computes the following statistics:
    • count
    • mean
    • standard deviation
    • minimum
    • maximum

      • unpack

        public static StatVar unpack(byte[] record,
                             int offset)
        Returns a StatVar giving to the unpacking of an array of byte at a specific position.
        Parameters:
        record - the array of byte which contained one or more StatVar packed.
        offset - the value of the position where we start the unpacking.
        Returns:
        Returns a StatVar giving to the unpacking of an array of byte at a specific position.

      • pack

        public void pack(byte[] record,
                 int offset)
        Packs a StatVar into an array of byte at a specific position.
        Parameters:
        record - the array of byte which contained the last StatVar packed and this new StatVar.
        offset - the value of the position where we start the packing.
